biography: Mikko is a golfer of considerable renown, known for his strategic mind and unwavering focus on the course. Representing Kurk Golf, Mikko brings a calculated approach to the game, often leaving spectators in awe of his well-thought-out plays.

While his participation in the Hector Trophée has been limited to a single occasion, his presence is always noted. Although he has yet to secure a victory in the Hector Trophée or claim the Victor Trophy, Mikko remains an active and respected figure in the event.

Off the course, Mikko is known for his thoughtful demeanor and analytical approach to the game. While he is not expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, fans remain hopeful that Mikko will once again grace the fairways with his presence in future competitions.
